tool_description: This API provides functionality related to the periodic table. It allows users to retrieve a comprehensive list of all chemical elements, obtain detailed information about a specific element using its unique identifier, and perform searches based on different criteria. Users can search for elements by their names, phases, groups, blocks, symbols, or a combination of these parameters, providing flexibility in accessing specific data points. Whether it's exploring the entire periodic table, ob...
name: Periodic Table API
title: Periodic Table API

api_list.name: search
api_list.description: The /search endpoint offers a versatile search functionality, allowing users to query the periodic table based on various criteria. Users can conduct searches by specifying parameters such as the name of the element, its phase, group, block, or symbol. This endpoint is designed to provide flexibility and precision in retrieving elements that match specific search criteria. Whether users are interested in finding elements by their common names, exploring elements within a particular phase or group, or identifying elements based on their unique symbols, the /search endpoint serves as a powerful tool for targeted exploration and retrieval of chemical elements from the periodic table.

api_list.name: getSingleElement
api_list.description: The getSingleElement/{name} endpoint enables users to retrieve detailed information about a specific chemical element by providing its name as a parameter. Through a GET request to this endpoint, users can access a wealth of data related to the specified element, including its atomic mass, phase, group, block, electron configuration, and various other properties. This endpoint is particularly useful for obtaining in-depth details about a single element of interest, catering to users who require specific and comprehensive information about a particular chemical entity from the periodic table.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSingleElement/Hydrogen"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com/getSingleElement/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getAllElements
api_list.description: The /getAllElements endpoint provides a straightforward way to access a complete list of all chemical elements. By making a GET request to this endpoint, users can retrieve essential information about each element, including details such as the element's name, atomic number, symbol, and other fundamental properties. This endpoint is designed to offer a comprehensive overview of the entire periodic table, facilitating easy access to basic data for all known chemical elements in a concise and organized format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com/getAllElements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "periodic-table-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
